author: Gabor Tak
title: On the Gravity Recommendation System
venue: Dept. of Measurement and Information Systems Budapest University of Technology and Economics
window: Then we describe the outline of our solution, called the Gravity Recommendation System (GRS), to the Netflix Prize contest, which is in the leader position with RMSE 0.8808 at the time of the submission of the paper. GRS comprises of the combination of different approaches that are presented in the main part of the paper.
